flagMasks.name: WQSF_REFLECTANCE_RECOM
flagMasks.expression: not ((WQSF_lsb.WATER or WQSF_lsb.INLAND_WATER) and not (WQSF_lsb.CLOUD or WQSF_lsb.CLOUD_AMBIGUOUS or WQSF_lsb.CLOUD_MARGIN or WQSF_lsb.INVALID or WQSF_lsb.COSMETIC or WQSF_lsb.SATURATED or WQSF_lsb.SUSPECT or WQSF_lsb.HISOLZEN or WQSF_msb.UNCORR_GLINT or WQSF_lsb.SNOW_ICE) and not (WQSF_lsb.AC_FAIL or WQSF_lsb.WHITECAPS or WQSF_lsb.ADJAC or WQSF_msb.RWNEG_O2 or WQSF_msb.RWNEG_O3 or WQSF_msb.RWNEG_O4 or WQSF_msb.RWNEG_O5 or WQSF_msb.RWNEG_O6 or WQSF_msb.RWNEG_O7 or WQSF_msb.RWNEG_O8))
flagMasks.description: Excluding pixels that are deemed unreliable for Water Leaving Reflectances. Flag recommended by QWG.

flagMasks.name: WQSF_CHL_OC4ME_RECOM

flagMasks.description: Excluding pixels that are deemed unreliable for Algal Pigment Concentration. Flag recommended by QWG.
